Package presentation

Class FileGenerator

java.lang.Object
presentation.FileGenerator
public class FileGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
This class' static methods are used to generate pdf files for the specific requirements of the WarehouseManagement application. The iText library is used for pdf generation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int noClientReports  
    private static int noOrderReports  
    private static int noProductReports  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FileGenerator()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void reportClient​(java.util.List<Client> clients)
    Generates a pdf file containing data from all the clients in the database, in a tabular form.
    static void reportOrder​(java.util.List<WarehouseOrder> orders)
    Generates a pdf file containing data from all the orders in the database, in a tabular form.
    static void reportOrder​(WarehouseOrder order)
    Generates a pdf file with a bill for the successful order, in a list form.
    static void reportProduct​(java.util.List<Product> products)
    Generates a pdf file containing data from all the products in the database, in a tabular form.
    static void reportUnderStock​(WarehouseOrder order)
    This function generates an out of stock bill for the failed order.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
